title: Interpretation of seeing colors in a dream

preview.html: Dreams and visions differ, both depending on the psychological state and social life that people go through, which directly affects the details of the dream, and therefore we find that interpretations are different and conflicting according to each vision and the goal behind it. . In this way, we find that the dream is evidence of a group of ideas that the subconscious mind works to store and extract, and during sleep the dream can be good news for the fortuneteller or a warning message to him. Interpretation of the dream of the heart in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the color white in dreams. Dream interpreters that the color white in Dreaming of an unrelated girl is one of the indications that engagement and marriage are approaching in record time for this girl. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the white color indicates the purity and chastity that characterizes the dreamer. The white color in general in a dream indicates the end of the rivalry and differences that exist between the dreamer and his enemies. White is one of the colors that heralds recovery from illness. Interpretation of anise in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of the color black in a dream. The color black in a dream is considered one of the colors that accompany the emergence of some problems and sorrows in the path of the dreamer, whether he is a man or a woman. The color black is considered in a woman’s dream. A married woman is one of the colors that indicate her separation from her husband in the event of divorce or travel and emigration by the husband. The color black in a dream generally indicates the control of negative thoughts in the mind of the dreamer during this period. If the color black appears in the color of a car, bag, or shoes, This is one of the indications that the dreamer will obtain a prestigious job in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream. Dream interpreters say that the color red indicates entering into a new romantic love relationship if the dreamer is not married. As for The appearance of the color red in a married woman’s dream is one of the signs of that woman’s imminent pregnancy. The color red in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the approaching situation and she must prepare for it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lion in a dream. The meaning of seeing the color blue in a dream. Dream interpreters say that blue is one of the colors that It indicates the speedy fulfillment of the dreams that the dreamer is looking for. If the dreamer is an expatriate, then the blue color in his dream is a sign of the approaching return to his homeland. The blue color in the dream of married people indicates the multiplicity of offspring that the dreamer will have. If the blue color appears in The dream of a pregnant woman is one of the signs of the birth of a male child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing milk in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream. Dream interpreters say that the green color in a dream is one of the signs of obtaining an abundant, lawful animal for the dreamer. And the green color in the patient’s dream indicates the approaching The patient will recover, God willing. The green color in the dream indicates the appearance of successive happy occasions on the dreamer’s path in the coming period. The green color in the dream of a man working in trade is a sign that you will achieve huge profits from working in this trade.

title: Is it valid to pray in a dream? Read what Ibn Sirin said?

preview.html: Does begging in a dream come true? This question occupies a great place in the minds of many dreamers, which is why we wrote this article full of interpretations and hints about seeing begging in a dream and when does begging come true? What are the most important signs of answered prayer in a dream? Follow them below. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. Do you pray in a dream? Before clarifying the answer to the question (Does begging come true in a dream?), it is necessary to mention some general indications of seeing begging in general: Researchers said Lawyers The symbol of begging in a dream has a promising meaning and interprets that the dreamer’s dreams and goals will come true in the near future. If the dreamer prays to God so strongly in the dream that he screams and screams loudly, then the vision indicates an increase in judgments and many experiences. Al-Nabulsi said that the vision of supplication is one of Auspicious visions indicate that the dreamer believes in God and does not neglect to perform the required obedience and worship. If the fortuneteller prays in the dream, and after completing the prayer, he sits on the prayer rug, and continues to pray to God a lot, and all the dhikr is happy, and there is no harm or harm. For one, the vision indicates this. Accept the dreamer’s supplication and accept his prayers, God willing. Do supplications come true in a dream and does God accept them? If the dreamer prays to God in a dream for something that he wants to come true in reality, then the meaning of the scene may sometimes be accumulated dreams. But if the dreamer is in need of money because he is struggling Financially in waking life, and he sees in his dream that he is begging God to give him money and cover, the jurists said that this vision symbolizes comfort, a lot of money. And paying off debts. If the dreamer saw that he was fasting in a dream and was supplicating to God with many supplications related to his emotional and material life and his work, then all the supplications mentioned in the dream will come true soon. Was supplication made in the dream by Ibn Sirin? If the fortuneteller is afraid of some matters in His life and prays to God in a dream to grant him security and stability, then this call will be answered, God willing. If the dreamer sees that it is the Night of Destiny, and raises his hands to the sky and continues to invoke many supplications related to his personal and family life in the dream, then what is the most important of this vision, as it is a dazzling comfort It is said about the dreamer who will gain it after the suffering, distress, and many crises he endured in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is sitting with a group of unknown people in a dream, and interrogates God and begs Him, and asks him to accept the supplications, then this vision warns the dreamer that these supplications will be fulfilled. Reality. The symbol of supplication in a sinner’s dream indicates repentance, and the lower the dreamer’s voice during supplication in the dream, the more the dream indicates the stability of the dreamer’s life and his enjoyment of his care. Does prayer in a dream apply to single people? If an unmarried woman calls upon the Lord of the Worlds in a dream and asks Him To support her in her life and grant her success and excellence, the vision indicates facilitating complex matters and achieving what she desires. If so

title: Interpretation of a dream about dust in a dream and the consequences of seeing dust in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the dream interpretation of dirt in a dream through a website about dreams, and see the opinions of dream interpreters about seeing dirt in a dream or seeing dust in a dream and the consequences of interpreting dirt in a dream for married and single people. Women.Interpretation of a dream about dirt. Dust in a dream, according to the opinion of Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, is evidence of man and because man was created from dust. It is said that seeing dirt in a dream can indicate the conditions of the world and dirt can refer to animals and livestock. Interpretation of dust in a dream can be a sign of Poverty and wealth and can indicate abundance of food or tight provision. It is said that the dream interpretation of dirt can indicate satiety and hunger and can indicate anxiety or joy, according to the vision. Seeing dirt in a dream can be a sign of travel that will be stressful, and it can Dirt in a dream indicates work. The dream interpretation of fine dirt is a sign of a woman, and the dream interpretation of dense dirt is a sign of a man. The interpretation of a dream of wet dirt in a dream can be a sign of blessed nourishment in it. Interpretation of throwing dirt on the face in a dream. Interpretation of throwing dirt on The face in a dream, or dirt on the head in a dream, may indicate the occurrence of a calamity, and God knows best. The interpretation of throwing dust on the face can indicate fears and sorrows, and it has been said that it is a sign of the dreamer’s hypocrisy and his praise of people. The interpretation of throwing dirt on the head may indicate A dream about the arrival of money, but after the dreamer makes an effort. Interpretation of a dream about dirt on clothes in a dream for a patient is a sign of the severity of the disease. Digging dirt in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about digging dirt in a dream can indicate the pursuit of sustenance and can indicate the end of the term and interpretation according to the vision Digging dirt in a traveler’s dream indicates travel and God will grant him relief from his journey as long as he comes out of the dirt in the holes. Interpretation of a dream of digging dirt in a dream for someone about to get married is evidence of marriage, and it has been said that dirt is evidence of virgin blood. Read in detail about: Interpretation of a dream about digging: Seeing clay in a dream. Dust in a dream. Seeing dust in a dream can be a sign of strife, and it is said that the dirt belongs to the merchant, if it is in his trade, it is a loss. Interpretation of dust in a dream, while the dreamer was washing his clothes, indicates the end of his problems and worries. Seeing the sky raining A lot of dirt or a large amount of dirt indicates torment, and God knows best. Cleaning dust in a dream indicates that the dreamer has finished his assigned work or the end of his duties. Interpretation of a dream about dirt for a single woman: Dirt in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate her livelihood, and the interpretation depends on the dream. Sweeping away dirt in an unmarried woman’s dream means getting rid of worries and sorrows. Dirt in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of dirt in a dream for a married woman could be a sign of pregnancy, but there is doubt about it, and God knows best. As for seeing a storm in a dream filled with dust, it is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to For accusations. It may indicate

title: The meaning of seeing fire in a dream

preview.html: Sometimes we see in our dreams a different set of strange signs and signs that we wonder about their interpretation or what is the sign they carry for us, and among these dreams is seeing fire in a dream. Its harms and we will explain the meaning of seeing fire in a dream if you see this dream in your sleep. The meaning of seeing fire in a dream for Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees that he is escaping from a fire or the presence of fire in a dream, this is an indication that this person will face a large group of difficulties and problems in his life, and whoever sees this dream is a sign from God Almighty for him to correct his situation and reconsider the mistakes he makes and try to improve the work he does. Which may affect a person. Ibn Sirin explains another interpretation, which is that if a person sees that there is someone helping him escape from these fires, this dream has different meanings, including that this person expects to suffer from a serious illness or that he will suffer from great financial distress. During periods, this negative interpretation of the dream can have another meaning, which is that he will find beside everyone who helps him overcome this disease and overcome this difficult matter that he will go through. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a fire for a single girl The interpretations of this dream differed according to the state in which this girl sees the dream. If the girl sees in her dream that she is escaping from a nearby fire, this is a sign of the girl escaping from a major conspiracy that may happen to her and an indication that she must preserve her dreams and focus on achieving more of her goals. Many scholars of interpretation explain that the girl's vision of fire in a dream is evidence that this girl's life will be very difficult and she will find it difficult to achieve her dreams and will find it difficult to achieve her goals, because she will need a lot of effort to achieve the desires that she aspires to achieve. If the unmarried girl sees in her dream that her house is approaching a fire, this is evidence of her engagement, but to whom she will not marry, because she will not agree to spend her life with him. She always tries to escape from reality and does not try to face the difficult things in her life. Seeing fire in a dream for a married woman A married woman may see fire in her dream, but she does not know its meaning, and we will explain the meaning of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a burning fire and escapes from it, this is evidence that she will resort to going to her father's house due to the marital problems that arise greatly between her and her husband. If she is married, the woman sees that she is escaping from the burning fire, this indicates that this woman suffers from some health problems and there is no need to worry about them, but this disease will pass peacefully and she will overcome this crisis. The woman wants to be freed from the restrictions that oblige her to be responsible for marriage. If the dreamer sees fire in a dream. It may be an indication of the torment of fire later. If the dreamer sees fire in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer may commit sins in reality and must repent for them, or the serious disorder that the dreamer causes in reality. If the dreamer sees fire in a dream. It may

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a restaurant in a dream?

preview.html: His story gives you an interpretation of how to dream about a restaurant. Restaurant is the place where people go to eat, it counts a lot of people in our life, everywhere they go to a restaurant to enjoy their food or plan, restaurants are everywhere. The world, so their vision in a dream was completely transferred to some in a complete dream. Therefore, we have collected for you, beloved, all the testimonies related to seeing the entrance to the restaurant, as well as what is the interpretation of the vision of the opening of the restaurant. We have collected for you the interpretation of the dream of a shawarma shop for a man, and we also present to you what is the interpretation of seeing a seat in a restaurant for the elderly, married people, and pregnant women. From the book of leading scholars on the interpretation of dreams and visions. Seeing a restaurant in a complete dream. Ibn Sirin. Seeing a large, luxurious restaurant in a dream indicates the broad support that the dreamer will receive in his life. Buying an entire restaurant in a dream means that you will earn a lot of money and enjoy a life of luxury. To meet a restaurant manager in a dream, Kamel is a sign that you find happiness in Luck. Greedy food in the dreamer's restaurant speaks of a large number of debts. An unclean restaurant in the dreamer's dream shows the meaning, problems and worries. See also: Why dream of seeing Tamiya in a completed dream? Why dream of a restaurant dream for a common woman. Dreaming of a luxurious restaurant for a good woman means that she will live a life Full of success and elegance. What is the dream of a restaurant full of people? It shows the girl that she is close to good company. The fact that she enters an empty restaurant shows a feeling of loneliness in her life. Tasting the restaurant’s food and the wonderful and delicious food – for her a message of a happy life full of fun. A girl in a dream indicates that full Sharing food with someone in a restaurant until the date of her wedding approaches. Why dream of a lone woman sitting in a restaurant is a praiseworthy vision of goodness and happiness. See also: Why does a dining room dream of a dreamWhy a married woman dreams of a restaurantSeeing a spacious restaurant in a married woman’s dream is one of the dreams that indicate... Goodness and blessings for her and her husband. In addition, there is delicious and beautiful food in a woman’s dream – this is news for her about a lot of wealth in money. The presence of a restaurant owner in a dream indicates that her husband will find a new job that will benefit him. A married woman who owns an entire restaurant in a dream shows her abundance. God's blessings in her life. To dream of a luxurious restaurant is happiness and joy. See also: Why dream of seeing a restaurant in a full dream? What is the dream of a restaurant for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman sitting in a crowded restaurant in a crowded dream indicates that she is in good health and will give birth easily. And the beautiful and elegant restaurant In her dream, it indicates that she will get rid of the fatigue and problems that she is suffering from. In addition, seeing food in a restaurant and its wonderful taste is a praiseworthy vision of goodness and happiness. See also: Why do you dream of chickpeas in a dream in detail? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below A team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake: The snake is a predatory reptile that devours anything it directs at and causes terror and panic to whoever sees it. As for seeing a yellow snake in a dream, it is good, or there is a warning message behind this dream and the dreamer must pay attention to it, and in the following lines we will clarify the details. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake: Seeing a yellow snake in a dream for the dreamer indicates bad news that he will learn in the coming period, and the yellow snake In the dream, it indicates that the sleeper falls into a serious health problem that can affect his life, so he must be careful. But if a man sees in his dream that a small yellow snake is circling around him, this symbolizes the proximity of a corrupt woman who is trying to get close to him to destroy his life, so he should To seek refuge in his Lord to save him. It is dangerous. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a new house in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of dreams to see a new house in a dream. Some people see the new house in a dream, some see it in bright colors and some see it in dark colors and each of them has a specific interpretation explained by Ibn Sirin and al. - Nabulsi A pregnant woman differs from her appearance in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a new house: Seeing a new house in a dream indicates a transition from an old life to a new life and a new life. The new house replaces a new life full of happiness and joy if the house is beautiful and clean. Whoever sees a new house in the dream inhabited by a stranger is evidence of the dreamer’s sins. Whoever dreams of building a house of gold, this indicates that he is a person who loves hypocrisy and hypocrisy. Seeing the construction of a new iron house means legitimate profit. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s vision of the new homeland: To see yourself entering a new, strange house, this indicates On the Day of Resurrection and the Hereafter. An abandoned house inside the dream. Point to the grave. Seeing an unmarried young man or girl in a strange house in a dream indicates a new but unhappy life. Seeing moving to a new house indicates repentance for sins and disobedience. Seeing yourself entering a new house in a dream indicates To a new life full of happiness. A new house in a man’s dream is evidence of his success and superiority. A new house can travel abroad for work. Interpretation of seeing a new house for a personIf a girl sees only If she buys a new house, she will live a new life. A new house in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates an imminent marriage. Perhaps a new house is distance from bad friends. Interpretation of seeing a new house for a married woman. A new house in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male child. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates the disappearance of problems between a married woman and her husband. Interpretation of seeing a new house for a pregnant woman. New house in a pregnant woman’s dream It indicates the presence of a male child and the new apartment is female. A new house indicates an easy birth. If the house is beautiful, this indicates a difficult birth. Seeing a new house means good luck. Interpretation of a man’s vision of a new house. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates an abundance of money and a man who will assume a position. New. A new house in a man’s dream also indicates wealth. A man’s vision of a new house indicates that he will get married soon. A man’s new house is to change his life for the better. A new house in a man’s dream indicates a woman’s pregnancy. Seeing a married man buying a new house in a dream indicates the success of his children. Seeing a new house in a single person’s dream is a sign of travel. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing one-eyed person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a monocle in a dream through seeing the website roy2a.com Seeing one eye in a dream, this indicates justice and piety for the dreamer, and it can indicate anxiety, sadness, and poverty, and seeing a person turning to one eye means that he is exposed to adversity and distress. Other contemporary performers, follow us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a one-eyed righteous man in a dream indicates his avoidance of forbidden things and his distance from committing sins and transgressions. A one-eyed dream shows a sinner and a sinner in a dream his many sins, and his distance About God, and increasing immorality. If one sees that he has become one-eyed in a dream, it means that he has lost something important in his life or that he has lost a loved one due to death or alienation. Seeing a one-eyed person in a dream means sadness, sorrow, poverty, and lack of money. See also: Interpretation of seeing a one-eyed woman in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a one-eyed woman in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a one-eyed person in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the advancement of a young man with a bad character, and she must be careful and careful about that. The one-eyed girl’s narration of the Antichrist in a dream indicates On the strength of her faith and righteousness, overcoming difficulties and achieving her dreams. See also: Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman with one eye in a dream for a married woman? And saying that a woman with one eye is in the house in a dream for a married woman indicates repentance and returning to God if she is pious, and if If it was a sin, this indicates distress and worry. Seeing a husband with one eye in a married woman’s dream indicates a lack of loyalty towards her and many disagreements between them. If a married woman sees that she has become one-eyed in a dream, this indicates many enemies and evil people in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing one eye? In a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a one-eyed woman healing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the possibility and ease of childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees a one-eyed child, this indicates that she will be exposed to problems during pregnancy and childbirth and the problem of childbirth. See also: Interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye In a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a woman with one eye in a dream for a divorced woman? To dream of a divorced woman who has become one-eyed means that she will be exposed to problems, troubles, and many obstacles that she will face. Seeing eyeballs in a dream means adversity and distress. Seeing the one-eyed Antichrist shows the woman’s good condition and that she will achieve what You want. See also: Interpretation of seeing eye color change in a dream. What is the interpretation of giving birth to a child with one eye in a dream? Seeing a child with one eye in a dream means that you will hear bad and sad news. Seeing a one-eyed child in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will be exposed to problems and pain. Seeing childbirth A one-eyed child of a married woman in a dream indicates marital or family problems and conflicts and psychological problems. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person with one eye in a dream? Seeing a dead person with one eye in a dream indicates his faults towards his parents or the severing of family ties and quarrels.

title: Interpretation of laughter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of laughter in a dream Laughter in a dream is one of the common visions that many people see in a dream and are looking for an interpretation of the dream. Seeing laughter and crying is a sign of comfort, but crying after laughing is bad news, and laughter in the voice indicates worry and sadness. Interpretation of laughter in a dream If a girl sees herself trying to laugh out loud in a dream, this means that she will hear good news and will be very happy about it, but If she sees herself laughing out loud, it means that she will suffer a lot. Pain that will make her very uncomfortable. Ibn Sirin said that if he sees an unmarried girl smiling happily in a public place among a group of friends, this indicates a positive change in her life, and this vision also portends a bright future for unmarried girls. But if she finds herself laughing, this means that she will soon get married and meet her life partner. If the girl sees that she is laughing out loud. This means that she will find herself in a great disaster and suffer a lot because of the problems. Because she will not be able to solve the problems she faces or get rid of the problems in Her life. Interpretation of laughter in a married woman’s dream: Seeing laughter in a married woman’s dream means happiness and family stability. If he sees her laughter loud and unnatural, this indicates the presence of problems with her husband. However, if he sees that he is only laughing and has no sound. This means that he will receive a lot It is good news in the near future. He will get rid of many of life’s problems and obstacles. But if she sees that she is laughing and the appearance of her teeth indicates her happiness and stability in life with her family. It seems that this vision contains good news and joy. Interpretation of laughter for someone who laughs in a dream: Seeing laughter without laughter It is a sign of friendship and love with the other person or good social relations. If the low-pitched laughter indicates mutual benefit between them and cooperation in a business partnership. Loud laughter means hearing sad news. Interpretation of laughter with relatives: Seeing laughter with relatives indicates the existence of a good relationship between them and Family bonding. Seeing loud laughter with relatives can indicate family problems and quarrels. Seeing loud laughter with relatives also indicates bad news. Interpretation of laughter by fighting: Seeing laughing loudly at someone who is quarreling with indicates reprimanding the fortuneteller. The vision can indicate many Of the problems and types between them. If the low-pitched laughter indicates reconciliation between them. Interpretation of laughter in a dream for a married man. Seeing laughter in a dream is a sign of bad news. Seeing laughter without a sound indicates kindness to parents and good relationships. Seeing yourself crying and then laughing may be A bad vision. It may indicate that you are hearing bad news. An accident could happen. Seeing laughter and then crying means getting rid of sadness and stress. Seeing laughter and crying at the same time in a dream indicates almost weakness. To get rid of sadness. At the end of this article we explained to you information A detailed and comprehensive discussion of the above topic, which is the interpretation of laughter in a dream. We wish you dreams

title: Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream: It could be a sign of goodness or a warning of evil, and interpreters have differed in the interpretation of this dream based on a large number of factors. Today, through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail based on the opinions of major translators, including Ibn Sirin. And Imam Al-Sadiq.Interpretation of drinking wine in a dreamDrinking wine in a dream indicates that the dreamer is spending forbidden money that he obtained without hardship or effort, and despite knowing this, he does not feel remorse.Wine in a single person’s dream portends that he will get married soon and his life will be more stable. Whoever dreams that he is drinking wine until he gets drunk, it shows that the dreamer is in love and closely connected to his beloved, but if he does not call, the dream symbolizes contact in the coming days. Drinking wine in the patient’s dream symbolizes recovery from illness and restoration of health and well-being. For a poor person, the dream promises him that he will receive a large sum of money and his life will be stable. One of the explanations mentioned by Imam Al-Sadiq is that he will assume power and position soon. As for the one who was looking forward to a promotion, the dream foretells that he will get it soon. Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream by Ibn SirinDrinking wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin symbolizes that the dreamer is backward in his religion in addition to committing many transgressions and sins. Whoever dreams that he is pressuring Grapes to obtain wine means that he assumes a position or that the dreamer performs many charitable works and works that benefit people, and getting drunk after drinking wine symbolizes wealth and luxury. Ibn Sirin stated that whoever dreams of drinking all kinds of wine indicates that anxiety and fear are currently controlling him and do not He feels safe. If he abstains from drinking alcohol despite the pressure on him to drink, this indicates that the insightful person is a pious person far from the temptations and pleasures of the world. He has strong faith and is as close to God Almighty as he can. Drinking alcohol in a dream by Al-OsaimiDrinking alcohol in a dream according to Fahd Al-Osaimi symbolizes obtaining prohibited money that he collects through illegal means. Whoever dreams of drinking wine mixed with water means that he will achieve high profits and gains in the coming period. He emphasized that drinking alcohol is a sign that the dreamer is committing things that are absolutely incompatible with Islamic law or social values. Whoever dreams of selling alcohol and drinking it at the same time is a sign of collecting money from usury or selling forbidden things such as drugs that amaze the mind. Drinking alcohol in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq says Respected Sheikh that Imam Al-Sadiq symbolizes obtaining money from illegal sources. We note here that most interpreters agreed with this interpretation. As for someone who dreams of drinking alcohol without getting drunk, this is a sign that goodness is approaching the dreamer’s life. Whoever dreams that he is holding two vessels in his hands, one of milk and the other a vessel of wine, indicates leaving his current job, or being fired from it in general. Drinking alcohol in a dream The student symbolizes his rise in status and the achievement of all academic goals,
